channel.title: Moving Objects/Npcs
channel.description: Hey was wondering if someone could help me move objects/npcs? anyone?

item.title: Moving Objects/Npcs
item.dc:creator: @b_b0yz_4 b b0yz 4
item.description:
@b_b0yz_4 wrote:

ok if you want to move an object you first need to find the id for it then you go into client.java and search the code. You neeed to find something like this.

 makeGlobalObject(2649, 2660, 9155, 0, 10);//Small furnace

This is just an example, but when you search it you need to find something like that. Then the 2660=x coorinate and the 9155=y coordinate. You just change those to the place where you want the object.

If you want to move an npc you find the id for it and then search for it in autospawn.cfg. you should find something like this

spawn = 556	3216	3438	0	0	0	0	0	0

all you do is change the 3216=x coordinate and the 3438=y coordinate to where ever you want it

I hope this helped

Read full topic
